meanings.definition: Relating to or prompted by feelings of tenderness, sadness, or nostalgia.
meanings.sent1: She kept a sentimental photo of her grandparents on her desk.
meanings.sent2: The movie's sentimental ending brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly called himself a sentimental old man when he teared up at the wedding.
meanings.sent4: The sentimental melody of the song reminded her of childhood lullabies.
meanings.sent5: The sentimental gift from her best friend was a cherished keepsake.

meanings.sent1: She found his sentimental outburst at the party embarrassing.
meanings.sent2: The actress's sentimental speech at the award ceremony seemed insincere.
meanings.sent3: His sentimental reaction to losing a game was over the top.
meanings.sent4: The sentimental display of affection made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: Her sentimental reaction to the sad movie was exaggerated.
